conbody.p: The elements in the typographic domain are used to describe styling characteristics. They are primarily intended as the basis for . Avoid using these elements.
Semantic elements should always be used in preference to typographic elements.

section.title: Rationale
section.lq: Never use these elements when a semantically specific element is available. These elements are not intended for use by specializers, and are intended solely for use by authors when no semantically appropriate element is available and a formatting effect is required.
